entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
